description: Divisional Secretary, Medadumbara Divisional Secretariat Vs. S. M. R. Samarakoon before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: Divisional Secretary, Medadumbara Divisional Secretariat Vs. S. M. R. Samarakoon
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
keywords: Can a defence be raised by the Respondent to an application made to Court by the competent authority under section 5(1) of the State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 of 1979 as amended that the land in question is not State Land within the meaning thereof.
legistation: State Land (Recovery of Possession) Act No. 07 1979 (as amended)-Sections 3, 4, 5(1), 6, 7, 8, 9(1) and 9(2) and 10 thereof
